remarks: Deduce consequence follows from either path implied by a disjunction.  If ` ph ` , as well as ` ps ` is sufficient condition for ` ch ` and ` ps ` or ` ph ` takes place, then the proposition ` ch ` holds.  Proposition 47 of [Frege1879] p. 48.  (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
